B C E G H I S T 

B

base - Variable in class Triangle
It stores the value of base of right angled triangle.

C

colour - Variable in class Square
It stores the colour of square as a character.
colour - Variable in class Triangle
It stores the value of colour of right-angled triangle.
Ex: 'r' for Red, 'b' for Blue , 'p' for pink etc

E

edge - Variable in class Square
It stores the integer value of edge of the square.

G

getArea() - Method in class Square
The method returns the area of the square, which can be calculated using field (@code edge).
Note: This is a int calculation.
getArea() - Method in class Triangle
The method returns the area of the right-angled triangle, which can be calculated using fields height and base.
getColour() - Method in class Square
The method returns the colour of the square, which is stored in the field colour.
getColour() - Method in class Triangle
The method returns the colour of the right-angled triangle, which is stored in the field colour.
getColourOfMaxSquare() - Method in class Shape
The method traverses through the squareList array and finds the Square object with the maximum area and returns the colour of that Square object.
Note: All the Square objects have distinct areas.
getColourOfMaxTriangle() - Method in class Shape
The method traverses through the triangleList array and finds the Triangle object with the maximum area and returns the colour of that Triangle object.
Note: All the Triangle objects have distinct areas.
getSquareCount() - Method in class Shape
The method returns the number of Square objects present in the squareList array.
getTriangleCount() - Method in class Shape
The method returns the number of Triangle objects present in the triangleList array.

H

height - Variable in class Triangle
It stores the value of height of right-angled triangle.

I

insertSquare(Square) - Method in class Shape
The method is used to insert a Square object in the squareList array and also update the squareCount value.
insertTriangle(Triangle) - Method in class Shape
The method is used to insert a Triangle object in the triangleList array and also update the triangleCount value.

S

Shape - Class in <Unnamed>
The basic class for operations on Triangle and Square classes.
Shape() - Constructor for class Shape
The constructor for class Shape.
Square - Class in <Unnamed>
The basic class representing Squares
Square(int, char) - Constructor for class Square
The constructor for class Square.
squareCount - Variable in class Shape
The count of Square objects present in the squareList array.
squareList - Variable in class Shape
An array containing objects of Square class.

T

Triangle - Class in <Unnamed>
The basic class representing Right Angled Triangles
Triangle(int, int, char) - Constructor for class Triangle
The constructor for class Triangle.
triangleCount - Variable in class Shape
The count of Triangle objects present in the triangleList array.
triangleList - Variable in class Shape
An array containing objects of Triangle class.
